name: UpdateDatastoreAttributes
description:
Update attributes of an existing datastore in Datadog.

Use this tool to update details of an existing datastore in Datadog by specifying its ID.

parameters.name: datastore_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to update in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

parameters.name: datastore_description
parameters.description: A human-readable description for the datastore. Use this to provide additional information or context about the datastore.

value_schema.description: A human-readable description about the datastore.

parameters.name: datastore_display_name
parameters.description: The display name of the datastore to be updated. Provide a concise, human-readable name.

value_schema.description: The display name of the datastore.

parameters.name: datastore_update_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the datastore that needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to update.

parameters.name: resource_type_for_datastores
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type for datastores. Must be 'datastores'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: datastore_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

parameters.name: data.attributes.description
parameters.description: A human-readable description about the datastore.

value_schema.description: A human-readable description about the datastore.

parameters.name: data.attributes.name
parameters.description: The display name of the datastore.

value_schema.description: The display name of the datastore.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to update.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to update.
